title: Health Insurance Application Form
description: Important: Please answer all questions completely and accurately as these statements form the basis of the insurance contract. Non-disclosure or misrepresentation may lead to cancellation of the policy.

full_name_ins.title: Insured Person's Full Name
full_name_ins.description: Fill for all members. Type NA if not applicable.

smoker_ins.title: Do you or any member smoke or consume tobacco?

alcoholic_ins.title: Do you or any member consume alcoholic beverages?

heart_ailment_ins.title: Suffer from High BP, Heart Attack, or other heart ailment?

hormonal_ailments_ins.title: Suffer from Diabetes, Thyroid, or other hormonal disorder?

neurological_ailments_ins.title: Suffer from Stroke, Epilepsy, or other neurological disorder?

respiratory_ailments_ins.title: Suffer from Asthma, TB, or other respiratory disorder?

liver_ailments_ins.title: Suffer from Ulcer, Hepatitis, or other gastrointestinal/liver disorder?

cancer_ins.title: Suffer from Cancer, Tumor, or any form of growth?

bone_ailments_ins.title: Suffer from Arthritis, Gout, or other joint/bone/spine disorder?

eye_ailments_ins.title: Suffer from Cataract, Glaucoma, or other eye disorder?

sexual_ailments_ins.title: Suffer from HIV / AIDS or other STD?

pcod_ailments_ins.title: For Female Members: Pregnant or suffering from any disorder of breast or reproductive organs?

recent_surgery_ins.title: Any surgery, hospitalization, or accident in the last 5 years?
